titleStmt.title: Poor Robin, 1683 a prognostication for the year of our Lord God 1683 : containing the vulgar notes for this present years times when to marry a good wife if you can light of her, a description of the three eclipses of this year, two of the moon, and one of the sun, when they happen, and what it signified by them, a more accurate account of the four quarters of the year, than hath hitherto been given, a very useful scheme ...
titleStmt.author: Poor Robin.
Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Poor Robin is a pseudonym for William Winstanley. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
